7D6903A6 4E800421
B0FE0002 8001000C
7C0803A6 38210008
4E800020 00000000

Save the current location of the kart and teleport back to that location at will.

Info:
Line 9 determines the activator value. (Default: 00000008)
Line 10 is the starting address of variables used by this code. (Default: 10014838)
 ⚠ If this address is changed, don't forget to change the undo codelines as well (From line 1 to 7).

Game Version: 4.2

Modes Supported:
 • Battle (Offline / Online)
 • Grand Prix
 • Time Trials
 • VS Race (Offline / Online)

Players Supported:
 • Wii U GamePad

Activate:
 • Hold X (Save)
 • Tap X (Load)

See Button Activators:
https://pastebin.com/iYs6n7Sb

Default Data Used:
0x10014838 (28 bytes)

Source:
https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
